entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Headmaster of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is calm but stern when discussing Harry's concerns.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is concerned about Snape and Malfoy's activities.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Teacher at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. Harry suspects him of being involved in something with Malfoy.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is suspected by Harry to be involved in something dangerous with Snape.

relationships.description: Harry expresses his concerns about Snape and Malfoy's activities to Dumbledore.
Harry suspects that Snape is involved in something dangerous with Malfoy.
